con:config.script:
import jxl.* import jxl.write.* import com.eviware.soapui.support.XmlHolder
Workbook workbook = Workbook.getWorkbook(new File('C:\\Users\\02155Y744\\Desktop\\Full stack tester\\data.xls')) Sheet sheet = workbook.getSheet(0) def rowCount = sheet.getRows()
def testCase = testRunner.testCase.testSuite.testCases["Test Case 1"] def teststep = testCase.testSteps['REST Request']
for(i = 0; i < rowCount ; i++) { cellName = sheet.getCell(0,i)
cellLocation = sheet.getCell(1,i) nameContent = cellName.getContents()
locationContent = cellLocation.getContents()
testRunner.testCase.testSuite.setPropertyValue('firstname', nameContent.toString())
testRunner.testCase.testSuite.setPropertyValue('lastname', locationContent.toString()) teststep.run(testRunner,context)
log.info('***'+nameContent.toString()+' - '+locationContent.toString())
}

import jxl.* import jxl.write.* import com.eviware.soapui.support.XmlHolder
Workbook workbook = Workbook.getWorkbook(new File('C:\\Users\\02155Y744\\Desktop\\Full_stack_tester\\M1\\data.xls')) Sheet sheet = workbook.getSheet(0) def rowCount = sheet.getRows()
def testCase = testRunner.testCase.testSuite.testCases["Manage_User"] def teststep = testCase.testSteps['REST Request']
for(i = 0; i < rowCount ; i++) { cellName = sheet.getCell(0,i)
cellLocation = sheet.getCell(1,i) nameContent = cellName.getContents()
locationContent = cellLocation.getContents()
testRunner.testCase.testSuite.setPropertyValue('firstname', nameContent.toString())
testRunner.testCase.testSuite.setPropertyValue('lastname', locationContent.toString()) teststep.run(testRunner,context)
log.info('***'+nameContent.toString()+' - '+locationContent.toString())
}

con:eventHandlers.name: RequestFilter.filterRequest
